analyzed: tv for ttv as in sattva etc

atha vajradharaḥ śrīmān durdānta damakaḥ paraḥ

original: prollālayan vajravaraṃ svakareṇa muhur muhuḥ // Mns_2 //

ullālayadbhiḥ sva karaiḥ prasphurat vajra koṭibhiḥ

original: śrīvatsaḥ suprabho dīptir bhā bhāsurakaradyutiḥ // Mns_102 //

daśa diś vyoma paryantaḥ dharma dhvaja mahā ucchrayaḥ
sarva buddha mahā rājā sarva buddha ātmabhāva dhṛk
sarva buddha mahā cittaḥ sarva buddha manogatiḥ
saṃbuddha vajra paryaṅkaḥ buddha saṃgīti dharma dhṛk
viśva māyā dharaḥ rājā buddha vidyā dharaḥ mahān
vajra tīkṣṇaḥ mahā khaḍgaḥ viśuddhaḥ parama akṣaraḥ
viśuddha dharma nairātmyam samyak jñāna indu hṛd prabhaḥ
sarva dharma abhisamayaḥ bhūta anta muniḥ agra dhīḥ
stimitaḥ su prasanna ātmā samyaksaṃbuddha bodhi dhṛk
pratyakṣaḥ sarva buddhānām jñāna arciḥ su prabhāsvaraḥ
pratyavekṣaṇā jñāna gāthāḥ dvācatvāriṃśat
bāhu daṇḍa śata ākṣepaḥ pada nikṣepa nartanaḥ
eka pāda tala ākrānta mahī maṇḍa tale sthitaḥ
brahmāṇḍa śikhara ākrānta pāda aṅguṣṭha nakhe sthitaḥ
eka arthaḥ dvaya dharma arthaḥ parama arthaḥ vinaśvaraḥ
nānā vijñapti rūpa arthaḥ citta vijñāna santati
aśeṣa bhāva artha ratiḥ śūnyatā ratiḥ agra dhīḥ
bhava rāga ādi atītaḥ ca bhava traya mahā ratiḥ
aṣṭāṅga mārga naya vid samyaksaṃbuddha mārga vid
sarva satva mahā saṅgaḥ niḥsaṅgaḥ gagana upamaḥ
sarva satva manaḥ jātaḥ sarva satva manojavaḥ
sarva satva indriya artha jñaḥ sarva satva manoharaḥ
sarva niryāṇa mārga sthaḥ sarva niryāṇa deśakaḥ
dvādaśa aṅga bhava utkhātaḥ dvādaśa ākāra śuddha dhṛk
catur satya naya ākāraḥ aṣṭa jñāna avabodha dhṛk
viṃśati ākāra saṃbodhiḥ vibuddhaḥ sarva vid paraḥ
sarva kṣaṇa abhisamayaḥ sarva citta kṣaṇa artha vid
yāna tritaya niryātaḥ eka yāna phale sthitaḥ
ogha udadhi samuttīrṇaḥ yoga kāntāra niḥsṛtaḥ
kleśa upakleśa saṃkleśa su prahīṇa sa vāsanaḥ
sarva saṃjñā prahīṇa arthaḥ vijñāna arthaḥ nirodha dhṛk
sarva satva manaḥ viṣayaḥ sarva satva manaḥ gatiḥ
sarva satva manaḥ tad citta samatā aṃgataḥ
siddhāntaḥ vibhrama apetaḥ sarva bhrānti vivarjitaḥ
eka kṣaṇa abhisaṃbuddhaḥ sarva buddha svabhāva dhṛk
aśeṣa rūpa saṃdarśī ratnaketuḥ mahā maṇiḥ
samatā jñāna gāthāḥ caturviṃśatiḥ
sarva saṃbuddha boddhavyaḥ buddha bodhiḥ anuttaraḥ
sarva mantra artha janakaḥ mahā binduḥ anakṣaraḥ
pañca akṣaraḥ mahā śūnyaḥ bindu śūnyaḥ śata akṣaraḥ
sarva ākāraḥ nirākāraḥ ṣoḍaśa ardha ardha bindu dhṛk
nirmāṇa kāyaḥ kāya agryaḥ
uttīrṇa bhava kāntāraḥ ekaḥ śāstā jagadguruḥ
prakhyātaḥ daśa diś loka dharma dānapatiḥ mahān
maitrī saṃnāha saṃnaddhaḥ karuṇā varma varmitaḥ
sarva māra camū jetā saṃbuddhaḥ loka nāyakaḥ

analyzed: vivṛttā vibhajitā uttānīkṛtā adhiṣṭhitā ca iyam mayā vajrapāṇe vajradhara tava saṃtāne

original: punar aparaṃ vajrapāṇe vajradhara iyaṃ nāmasaṃgītiḥ suviśuddhaparyavadātasarvajñajñānakāyavāṅmanoguhyabhūtā /
analyzed: punar aparam vajrapāṇe vajradhare iyam nāma saṃgītiḥ su viśuddha paryavadāta sarvajña jñāna kāya vāc manaḥ guhya bhūtā
sarva tathāgatānām buddha bodhiḥ
samyaksaṃbuddhānām abhismayaḥ

original: punar aparaṃ vajrapāṇe vajradhara iyaṃ nāmasaṃgītiḥ sarvasatvānāṃ aśeṣakāyavāṅmanaḥsamudācārapāpapraśamanī /
analyzed: punar aparam vajrapāṇe vajradhare iyam nāma saṃgītiḥ sarva satvānām aśeṣa kāya vāc manaḥ samudācāra pāpa praśamanī
sarva satvānām sarva apāyānām viśodhanī
sarva karma āvaraṇānām samucchedanī

ṣaṣ pāramitā paripūri bhūtāḥ āmiṣa abhaya dharma dāna utsarjana tayā
daśa bhūmi pratilambha bhūtā
puṇya jñāna saṃbhāra samādhi paripūraṇa tayā
advaya dharma tā dvaya dharma vigata tvāt
tathatā rūpa tā an anya dharma tā adhyāropa vigata tvāt
bhūtakoṭi rūpa tā pariśuddha tathāgata jñānakāya svabhāva tayā
sarva ākāra mahā śūnyatā rūpa tā aśeṣa kudṛṣṭi gahana gati nirghātana tayā
sarva dharma anabhilāpya rūpā iyam nāma saṃgītiḥ yat uta advaya dharmatā artham nāma saṃdhāraṇa prakāśana tayā iti
tṛtīya cakrasya iyam anuśaṃsā tad padāni dvāpañcāśat

original: punar aparaṃ vajrapāṇe vajradhara yaḥ kaścit kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā mantramukhacaryācārī
analyzed: punar aparam vajrapāṇe vajradhara yaḥ kaścid kula putraḥ vā kula duhitā vā mantra mukha caryā cārī

original: imāṃ bhagavato mañjuśrījñānasatvasya sarvatathāgatajñānakāyasya jñānamūrter advayaparamārthāṃ
analyzed: imām bhagavataḥ mañjuśrī jñānasatvasya sarva tathāgata jñānakāyasya jñāna mūrteḥ advaya parama arthām

original: nāmasaṃgītiṃ nāmacūḍāmaṇiṃ sakalaparisamāptam anyūnām akhaṇḍām ebhir eva gāthāpadavyañjanaiḥ
analyzed: nāma saṃgītim nāma cūḍāmaṇim sakala parisamāptam anyūnām akhaṇḍām ebhiḥ eva gāthā pada vyañjanaiḥ

original: pratyaham akhaṇḍaṃ triṣkālaṃ dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati /
analyzed: pratyaham akhaṇḍam triṣkālam dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśas ca manasikariṣyati

original: parebhyaś ca vistareṇa yathāsamayaṃ yathāyogyato yāvat saṃprakāśayiṣyati pratyekaṃ cānyatamānyatamanāmārthaṃ /
analyzed: parebhyaḥ ca vistareṇa yathāsamayam yathāyogyataḥ yāvat saṃprakāśayiṣyati pratyekam ca anyatama anyatama nāma artham
mañjuśrī jñānakāyam ālambanīkṛtya ekāgra mānasaḥ bhāvayiṣyati
adhimukti tatva manaskārābhyām samanta mukha vihāra vihārī sarva dharma prativedhikayā paramayā

original: anāvilayā prajñānuviddhayā śraddhayā samanvāgataḥ saṃstasya tryadhvānadhvasamaṅginaḥ
analyzed: anāvilayā prajñā anuviddhayā śraddhayā samanvāgataḥ san tasya tri adhva anadhva samaṅginaḥ
sarva buddha bodhisatvāḥ samāgamya saṃgamya sarva dharma mukhāni upadarśayiṣyanti
ātma bhāvam ca upadarśayiṣyati

original: durdāntadamakāś ca mahākrodharājāno mahāvajradharādayo jagatparitrāṇabhūtā nānānirmāṇarūpakāyair ojobalaṃ tejo 'pradhṛṣyatāṃ sarvamudrāmantrābhisamayamaṇḍalāny  #
analyzed: durdānta damakāḥ ca mahā krodha rājānaḥ mahāvajradhara ādayaḥ jagat paritrāṇa bhūtāḥ nānā nirmāṇa rūpa kāyaiḥ ojaḥ balam pradhṛṣyatām sarva mudrā mantra abhisamaya maṇḍalāni
upadarśayiṣyanti

original: aśeṣāś ca mantravidyārājñyaḥ sarvavighnavināyakamārārimahāpratyaṅgirāmahāparājitāḥ sarātriṃdivaṃ pratikṣaṇaṃ sarveryāpatheṣu rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ  #
analyzed: aśeṣāḥ ca mantra vidyā rājñyaḥ sarva vighna vināyaka mārāri mahāpratyaṅgirā mahāparājitāḥ sa rātriṃdivam pratikṣaṇam sarva īryāpatheṣu rakṣā āvaraṇa guptim
kariṣyanti
sarva buddha bodhisatva adhiṣṭhānam kariṣyanti
sarva kāya vāc manobhiḥ tasya saṃtāne samyak adhiṣṭhāsyanti
sarva buddha bodhisatva anugraheṇa ca anugrahīṣyanti
sarva dharma vaiśāradya pratibhānam ca upasaṃhariṣyanti
sarva arhat śrāvaka pratyekabuddha ārya dharma prema āśaya tayā ātma bhāvam ca upadarśayiṣyanti
ye ca brahma indra upendra rudra nārāyaṇa sanatkumāra maheśvara kārtikeya mahākāla nandikeśvara yama varuṇa kuvera hārītī daśa diś lokapālāḥ

original: ca satatasamitaṃ sarātriṃdivaṃ gacchatas tiṣṭhataḥ śayānasya niṣaṇṇasya svapato
analyzed: ca satata samitam sa rātriṃdivam gacchataḥ tiṣṭhataḥ śayānasya niṣaṇṇasya svapataḥ

original: jāgrataḥ samāhitasyāsamāhitasya ca ekākino bahujanamadhyagatasya ca yāvad
analyzed: jāgrataḥ samāhitasya asamāhitasya ca ekākinaḥ bahu jana madhya gatasya ca yāvat
grāma nagara nigama janapada rāṣṭra rājadhānī madhya gatasya indrakīla rathyā pratolī nagara dvāra vīthī catvara śṛṅgāṭaka nagara antarāpaṇa paṇya śālā madhya gatasya
yāvat śūnya agara giri kandara nadī vana gahana upagatasya ucchiṣṭasya an ucchiṣṭasya mattasya

original: pramattasya sarvadā sarvathā sarvaprakāraṃ ca parāṃ rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ kariṣyanti /
analyzed: pramattasya sarvadā sarvathā sarva prakāram ca parām rakṣā āvaraṇa guptim kariṣyanti
ratriṃdivam param svastyayanam kariṣyanti

original: ye cānye devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragā manuṣyāmanuṣyāś ca ye cānye
analyzed: ye ca anye deva nāga yakṣa gandharva asura garuḍa kinnara mahoragāḥ manuṣya amanuṣyāḥ ca ye ca anye

original: grahanakṣatramātṛgaṇapatayo yāś ca sapta mātaro yāś ca yakṣiṇīrākṣasīpiścācyas tāḥ
analyzed: graha nakṣatra mātṛ gaṇapatayaḥ yāḥ ca sapta mātaraḥ yāḥ ca yakṣiṇī rākṣasī piścācyaḥ tāḥ

original: sarvāḥ sahitāḥ samagrāḥ sasainyaḥ saparivārāḥ sarve te rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ kariṣyanti /
analyzed: sarvāḥ sahitāḥ samagrāḥ sa sainyaḥ sa parivārāḥ sarve te rakṣā āvaraṇa guptim kariṣyanti

original: paraṃ ca tasya kāye ojobalaṃ prakṣepsyanti /
analyzed: param ca tasya kāye ojaḥ balam prakṣepsyanti
ārogya balam āyuḥ vṛddhin ca upasaṃhariṣyanti
caturtha cakrasya iyam anuśaṃsā tad padāni ekonaviṃśati

original: punar aparaṃ vajrapāṇe vajradhara ya imāṃ nāmasaṃgītiṃ nāmacūḍāmaṇiṃ pratyaham akhaṇḍasamādānatas triḥkṛtvā kaṇṭhagatām āvartayiṣyati /
analyzed: punar aparam vajrapāṇe vajradhara yaḥ imām nāma saṃgītim nāma cūḍāmaṇim pratyaham akhaṇḍa samādānataḥ tris kṛtvā kaṇṭha gatām āvartayiṣyati
pustaka gatām vā paṭhamānaḥ pravartayiṣyati

original: bhagavato mañjuśrījñānasatvasya rūpam ālambayann anuvicintayaṃs tadrūpam anudhyāyan /
analyzed: bhagavataḥ mañjuśrī jñānasatvasya rūpam ālambayan anuvicintayan tad rūpam anudhyāyan

original: tam eva rūpakāyenācirād eva dharmavinayam upādāya drakṣyati /
analyzed: tam eva rūpa kāyena acirāt eva dharma vinayam upādāya drakṣyati

original: gaganatalagatāṃś ca sarvabuddhabodhisatvān nānānirmāṇarūpakāyaiḥ sahagatān drakṣyati /
analyzed: gagana tala gatān ca sarva buddha bodhisatvān nānā nirmāṇa rūpa kāyaiḥ sahagatān drakṣyati

original: na tasya mahāsatvasya jātu kadācit kathamapi durgatyapāyapatanaṃ ca bhaviṣyati /
analyzed: na tasya mahāsatvasya jātu kadācid katham api durgati apāya patanam ca bhaviṣyati
nīca kula upapattiḥ na bhaviṣyati
pratyanta janapada upapattiḥ na bhaviṣyati
na hīna indriyaḥ bhaviṣyati
na vikala indriyaḥ bhaviṣyati
na mithyādṛṣṭi kula upapattiḥ bhaviṣyati
na abuddheṣu buddhakṣetreṣu upapatsyate
na buddha utpāda tad deśita dharma vimukha parokṣa tā bhaviṣyati
na ca dīrgha āyuṣkeṣu deveṣu upapatsyate
na ca durbhikṣa roga śastra antara kalpeṣu upapatsyate
na ca pañca kaṣāya kāleṣu upapatsyate
na ca rāja śatru caura bhayam bhaviṣyati
na ca sarva vaikalya dāridra bhayam
na ca aśloka abhyākhyāna nindā yaśaḥ kīrti bhayam bhaviṣyati
su jāti kula gotra saṃpannaḥ ca bhaviṣyati
samanta prāsādika rūpa varṇa samanvāgataḥ bhaviṣyati
priyaḥ manaāpa sukha saṃvāsa priya darśanaḥ ca lokānām bhaviṣyati
śubha saubhāgya ādeya vākyaḥ ca satvānām bhaviṣyati

original: sa yatra yatropapatsyate tatra tatra jātau jātau jātismaro bhaviṣyati /
analyzed: sa yatra yatra upapatsyate tatra tatra jātau jātau jātismaraḥ bhaviṣyati
mahā bhogaḥ mahā parivāraḥ kṣaya bhogaḥ kṣaya parivāraḥ bhaviṣyati
agraṇīḥ sarva satvānām agra guṇa samanvāgataḥ bhaviṣyati
prakṛtyā ca ṣaṣ pāramitā guṇaiḥ samanvāgataḥ bhaviṣyati
catur brahmavihāra vihārī ca bhaviṣyati
smṛti saṃprajanya upāya bala praṇidhi jñānaiḥ samanvāgataḥ ca bhaviṣyati
sarva śāstra viśāradaḥ vāgmī ca bhaviṣyati
spaṣṭa vāc ajaḍa paṭu matiḥ bhaviṣyati

original: dakṣo 'nalasaḥ saṃtuṣṭo mahārtho vitṛṣṇaś ca bhaviṣyati /
analyzed: dakṣaḥ nalasaḥ saṃtuṣṭaḥ mahārthaḥ vitṛṣṇaḥ ca bhaviṣyati
parama viśvāsī ca sarva satvānām
bhaviṣyati
ācārya upādhyāya gurūṇām ca saṃmataḥ bhaviṣyati

original: aśrutapūrvāṇi ca tasya śilpakalābhijñājñānaśāstrāṇi cārthato granthataś ca pratibhāsam āgamiṣyati /
analyzed: a śruta pūrvāṇi ca tasya śilpa kalā abhijñā jñāna śāstrāṇi ca arthataḥ granthataḥ ca pratibhāsam āgamiṣyati
su pariśuddha śīla ājīva samudācāra cārī ca bhaviṣyati
su pravrajitaḥ su upasaṃpannaḥ ca bhaviṣyati
apramuṣita sarvajña tā mahā bodhi cittaḥ ca bhaviṣyati
na jātu śrāvaka arhat pratyekabuddha niyāma avakrānti gataḥ ca bhaviṣyati
pañcama cakrasya iyam anuśaṃsā tad padāni ekapañcāśat

original: evaṃ vajrapāṇe vajradhara aprameyaguṇasamanvāgato 'sau mantramukhacaryācārī bhaviṣyati /
analyzed: evam vajrapāṇe vajradhara aprameya guṇa samanvāgataḥ sau mantra mukha caryā cārī bhaviṣyati

original: anyaiś cāprameyair evaṃprakārair evaṃjātīyair guṇagaṇaiḥ samanvāgato bhaviṣyati /
analyzed: anyaiḥ ca aprameyaiḥ evaṃprakāraiḥ evaṃjātīyaiḥ guṇa gaṇaiḥ samanvāgataḥ bhaviṣyati
acirāt eva vajrapāṇe vajradhara parama artha nāma saṃgīti saṃdhāraka puruṣa puṃgavaḥ su saṃbhṛta puṇya jñāna saṃbhāraḥ
ksiprataram buddha guṇān samudānīya anuttarām samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate

original: analpakalyāṇaparinirvāṇadharmaḥ sarvasatvānām anuttaradharmadeśako 'dhiṣṭhito daśadiksaddharmadundubhir dharmarāja iti /
analyzed: analpa kalyāṇa parinirvāṇa dharmaḥ sarva satvānām anuttara dharma deśakaḥ dhiṣṭhitaḥ daśa diś saddharma dundubhiḥ dharmarājaḥ iti
ṣaṣṭha cakrasya anuśaṃsā tad padāni aprameyāṇi

original: oṃ sarvadharmābhāvasvabhāvaviśuddhavajra a ā aṃ aḥ /
analyzed: om sarva dharma abhāva svabhāva viśuddha vajraiḥ a ā aṃ aḥ

original: prakṛtipariśuddhāḥ sarvadharmā yaduta sarvatathāgatajñānakāyamañjuśrīpariśuddhitām upādāyeti a āḥ sarvatathāgatahṛdayaṃ hara hara /
analyzed: prakṛti pariśuddhāḥ sarva dharmāḥ yat uta sarva tathāgata jñānakāya mañjuśrī pariśuddhi tām upādāya iti a āḥ sarva tathāgata hṛdayam hara hara

original: oṃ hūṃ hrīḥ bhagavan jñānamūrtivāgīśvara mahāvāca sarvadharmagaganāmalasupariśuddhadharmadhātujñānagarbha āḥ /
analyzed: om     bhagavan jñāna mūrti vāc īśvara mahā vāca sarva dharma gagana amala su pariśuddha dharmadhātu jñāna garbhaḥ āḥ
mantra vinyāsaḥ
atha vajradharaḥ śrīmām hṛṣṭa tuṣṭaḥ kṛtāñjaliḥ

original: praṇamya nāthaṃ saṃbuddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ tathāgataṃ // Mns_163 //
analyzed: praṇamya nātham saṃbuddham bhagavantam tathāgatam

original: anyaiś ca bahuvidhair nāthair guhyendrair vajrapāṇibhiḥ /
analyzed: anyaiḥ ca bahuvidhaiḥ nāthaiḥ guhya indraiḥ vajra pāṇibhiḥ

original: sa sārdhaṃ krodharājānaiḥ provācoccair idaṃ vacaḥ // Mns_164 //
analyzed: sa sārdham krodha rājānaiḥ provāca uccais idam vacaḥ
anumodāmahe nātha sādhu sādhu subhāṣitam
kṛtaḥ smākam mahān arthaḥ samyaksaṃbodhi prāpakaḥ
jagataḥ ca api anāthasya vimukti phala kāṃkṣiṇaḥ
śreyaḥ mārgaḥ viśuddhaḥ yam māyā jāla naya uditaḥ

original: buddhānāṃ viṣayo hy eṣa samyaksaṃbuddhadeśitaḥ // Mns_167 //
analyzed: buddhānām viṣayaḥ hi eṣa samyaksaṃbuddha deśitaḥ
iti upasaṃhāra gāthāḥ pañca

original: āryamāyājālāt ṣoḍaśasāhasrikān mahāyogatantrāntaḥpātisamādhijālapaṭalād bhagavattathāgataśākyamunibhāṣitā bhagavato mañjuśrījñānasatvasya paramārthā  #
analyzed: ārya māyā jālāt ṣoḍaśa sāhasrikāt mahā yogatantra antaḥpāti samādhi jāla paṭalāt bhagavat tathāgata śākyamuni bhāṣitā bhagavataḥ mañjuśrī jñāna satvasya parama arthā  /
nāma saṃgītiḥ parisamāptā
